name: Yimiao Sun (孙一淼)
description:
Biography: I'm currently a fifth-year Ph.D. student at School of Software, Tsinghua University, and now a member of The System and Ubiquitous Networking Group (SUN) led by Prof. Yuan He. I received my B.S. degree from UESTC in 2021. My current research interests includes: wireless sensing, mobile computing and RF computing.
Contact Me: sym21@mails.tsinghua.edu.cn;   sun_yimiao@foxmail.com
